content: color black the eyes row 20-22 single_crochet around for 3 row 12 change to color yellow row 23-24 single_crochet around for 2 row 12 change to color black row 25-27 single_crochet around for 3 row 12 change to color red row 28-34 single_crochet around for 7 row 12 change to color black row 35-49 repeat color changes and row 20-34 12 change to color black row 50-52 single_crochet around for 3 row 12 after row 34 showing one full color repetition 5 head & body continued change to color yellow row 53-54 single_crochet around for 2 row 12 change to color black row 55-57 single_crochet around for 3 row 12 change to color red row 58-63 single_crochet around for 6 row 12 row 64 4sc decrease x2 10 change to color black row 65-66 single_crochet around for 2 row 10 row 67 3sc decrease x2 8 change to color yellow body after row 64 row 68-69 single_crochet around for 2 row 8 change to color black row 70-71 single_crochet around for 2 row 8 finishing stuffing the snake at this point row 72 2sc decrease x2 6 row 73-74 single_crochet around for 2 row 6 row 75 single_crochet decrease x2 4 cut your yarn and tie off sew the hole shut and weave in your end finished tail tip 6 all finished thank you for following along with this pattern i hope you ve enjoyed making this plushie if you did a review would be greatly appreciated feel free to share photos of what you made i would love to see them you re more than welcome to sell the finished plushie from this pattern but do not share or resell this pattern if you noticed any errors in this pattern or have suggestions for improvement please send me a message
